class.name: MediaPipeEmbedderOptions
class.brief_description: Embedder options for MediaPipe embedding extraction tasks.
class.description: [MediaPipeEmbedderOptions] wraps common options for MediaPipe tasks that performs embedding extraction.

members.member: Whether to normalize the returned feature vector with L2 norm. Use this option only if the model does not already contain L2 normalization operation.
Whether the returned embedding should be quantized to bytes via scalar quantization. Embeddings are assumed to have a value between [-1.0, 1.0], use [member l2_normalize] if this is not the case.
